GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an object containing details for specified user

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object containing a single article

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for a specified article

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: increments votes on specified article by amount given in body

examplePatchBody.inc_votes: <number to increment votes by (negative number to decrement)>

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a new comment to the specified article and increments comment count for the article

examplePostBody.author: general-kangaroo
examplePostBody.article_id: <ID of the article being commented on>

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: increments votes on specified comment by amount given in body

examplePatchBody.inc_votes: <number to increment votes by (negative number to decrement)>

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes specified comment and decrements comment count for relevant article
